modName: Witcher 3 Yennefer and Triss Armors Craftable
summary: Makes "Witcher 3 Yennefer and Triss Armors" Craftable
descriptionHtml:
Makes armors craftable and temperable. You can still get the armors the old way if you want.

You can craft armors normally at forge, if you are mage and want unarmored versions, you can find them at tanning rack.
Armors can be tempered whether they have enchantments or not.

Armors have Elven stats and are all enchantable.

You need original mod here:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69007/?


Install: Overwrite original mods .esp or let NMM or other mod manager do that.


Credits & Thank you:

zzjay

+ Others involved with the original mod.

All credits to them, I just typed some letters.
author: DenassaG
